'dark':'light');\n    de.setAttribute('data-theme-owner','tp');\n    document.body && document.body.classList.remove('dark');\n    if (typeof window!=='undefined') {\n      window.__theme = {\n        get: function(){ try { return localStorage.getItem(KEY)||'light'; } catch(_) { return 'light'; }},\n        set: function(mode){ try{ localStorage.setItem(KEY, mode); }catch(e){}; \n          var s = window.matchMedia && window.matchMedia('(prefers-color-scheme: dark)').matches;\n          var d = mode==='dark' || (mode==='system' && s);\n          de.classList.toggle('dark', !!d);\n          de.setAttribute('data-theme', d ? 'dark':'light');\n          de.setAttribute('data-theme-owner','tp');\n          document.body && document.body.classList.remove('dark');\n        }\n      };\n    }\n  }catch(e){}\n})();`;\nclass \"__barrel_optimize__?names=Monitor,Moon,Sun!=!../../node_modules/.pnpm/lucide-react@0.542.0_react@18.3.1/node_modules/lucide-react/dist/esm/lucide-react.js\");\n// apps/frontend/src/lib/theme-provider.tsx - Enhanced Theme Provider with Dark Mode\n\n\nconst ThemeContext = /*#__PURE__*/ (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__.createContext)(undefined);\nconst THEME_KEY = \"ui.theme\";\nfunction ThemeProvider({ children }) {\n    const [theme, setTheme] = (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__.useState)(\"system\");\n    const [resolvedTheme, setResolvedTheme] = (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__.useState)(\"light\");\n    const [mounted, setMounted] = (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__.useState)(false);\n    (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__.useEffect)(()=>{\n        setMounted(true);\n        // Load theme from localStorage\n        let savedTheme = null;\n        try {\n            savedTheme = localStorage.getItem(THEME_KEY);\n        } catch  {}\n        if (savedTheme && [\n            \"light\",\n            \"dark\",\n            \"system\"\n        ].includes(savedTheme)) {\n            setTheme(savedTheme);\n        }\n    }, []);\n    (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__.useEffect)(()=>{\n        if (!mounted) return;\n        const root = window.document.documentElement;\n        const updateTheme = ()=>{\n            let newResolvedTheme;\n            if (theme === \"system\") {\n                newResolvedTheme = window.matchMedia(\"(prefers-color-scheme: dark)\").matches ? \"dark\" : \"light\";\n            } else {\n                newResolvedTheme = theme;\n            }\n            setResolvedTheme(newResolvedTheme);\n            // Update DOM: only toggle .dark on <html>\n            if (newResolvedTheme === \"dark\") {\n                if (!root.classList.contains(\"dark\")) root.classList.add(\"dark\");\n            } else {\n                if (root.classList.contains(\"dark\")) root.classList.remove(\"dark\");\n            }\n            // Single authority attributes\n            root.setAttribute(\"data-theme\", newResolvedTheme);\n            root.setAttribute(\"data-theme-owner\", \"tp\");\n            // Never allow body.dark\n            if (document.body) document.body.classList.remove(\"dark\");\n            // Update meta theme-color for mobile browsers\n            const metaThemeColor = document.querySelector('meta[name=\"theme-color\"]');\n            if (metaThemeColor) {\n                metaThemeColor.setAttribute(\"content\", newResolvedTheme === \"dark\" ? \"#1f2937\" : \"#ffffff\");\n            }\n            // Update CSS custom properties\n            if (newResolvedTheme === \"dark\") {\n                root.style.setProperty(\"--color-bg-primary\", \"#1f2937\");\n                root.style.setProperty(\"--color-bg-secondary\", \"#111827\");\n                root.style.setProperty(\"--color-text-primary\", \"#f9fafb\");\n                root.style.setProperty(\"--color-text-secondary\", \"#d1d5db\");\n                root.style.setProperty(\"--color-border\", \"#374151\");\n            } else {\n                root.style.setProperty(\"--color-bg-primary\", \"#ffffff\");\n                root.style.setProperty(\"--color-bg-secondary\", \"#f8fafc\");\n                root.style.setProperty(\"--color-text-primary\", \"#1f2937\");\n                root.style.setProperty(\"--color-text-secondary\", \"#6b7280\");\n                root.style.setProperty(\"--color-border\", \"#e5e7eb\");\n            }\n        };\n        updateTheme();\n        // Listen only when user mode is system\n        if (theme === \"system\") {\n            const mediaQuery = window.matchMedia(\"(prefers-color-scheme: dark)\");\n            const handleChange = ()=>updateTheme();\n            mediaQuery.addEventListener(\"change\", handleChange);\n            return ()=>mediaQuery.removeEventListener(\"change\", handleChange);\n        }\n    }, [\n        theme,\n        mounted\n    ]);\n    const handleSetTheme = (newTheme)=>{\n        setTheme(newTheme);\n        try {\n            localStorage.setItem(THEME_KEY, newTheme);\n        } catch  {}\n    };\n    const value = {\n        theme,\n        setTheme: handleSetTheme,\n        resolvedTheme,\n        isDark: resolvedTheme === \"dark\"\n    };\n    return /*#__PURE__*/ (0,react_jsx_dev_runtime__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_0__.jsxDEV)(ThemeContext.Provider, {\n        value: value,\n        children: children\n    }, void 0, false, {\n        fileName: \"/home/saschi/InfoTerminal/apps/frontend/src/lib/theme-provider.tsx\",\n        lineNumber: 109,\n        columnNumber: 5\n    }, this);\n}\nfunction useTheme() {\n    const context = (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__.useContext)(ThemeContext);\n    if (context === undefined) {\n        // Fallback for tests or environments without the provider\n        const isDark = typeof document !== \"undefined\" && document.documentElement.classList.contains(\"dark\");\n        return {\n            theme: \"system\",\n            setTheme: ()=>{},\n            resolvedTheme: isDark ? \"dark\" : \"light\",\n            isDark\n        };\n    }\n    return context;\n}\n// Enhanced Theme Toggle Component\n\nfunction ThemeToggle({ size = \"md\", variant = \"button\", showLabel = false, className = \"\" }) {\n    const { theme, setTheme, resolvedTheme, isDark } = useTheme();\n    const [mounted, setMounted] = (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__.useState)(false);\n    (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__.useEffect)(()=>{\n        setMounted(true);\n    }, []);\n    if (!mounted) {\n        const sizeClasses = {\n            sm: \"w-8 h-8\",\n            md: \"w-9 rounded-lg bg-gray-200 dark:bg-gray-700 animate-pulse ${className}`\n        }, void 0, false, {\n            fileName: \"/home/saschi/InfoTerminal/apps/frontend/src/lib/theme-provider.tsx\",\n            lineNumber: 160,\n            columnNumber: 7\n        }, this);\n    }\n    const sizeClasses = {\n        sm: \"p-1.5\",\n        md: \"p-2\",\n        lg: \"p-2.5\"\n    };\n    const iconSizes = {\n        sm: 14,\n        md: 16,\n        lg: 18\n    };\n    const toggleTheme = ()=>{\n        if (theme === \"light\") {\n            setTheme(\"dark\");\n        } else if (theme === \"dark\") {\n            setTheme(\"system\");\n        } else {\n            setTheme(\"light\");\n        }\n    };\n    const getIcon = ()=>{\n        if (theme === \"system\") return /*#__PURE__*/ (0,react_jsx_dev_runtime__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_0__.jsxDEV)(_barrel_optimize_names_Monitor_Moon_Sun_lucide_react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_2__.Monitor, {\n            size: iconSizes[size]\n        }, void 0, false, {\n            fileName: \"/home/saschi/InfoTerminal/apps/frontend/src/lib/theme-provider.tsx\",\n            lineNumber: 187,\n            columnNumber: 36\n        }, this);\n (0,react_jsx_dev_runtime__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_0__.jsxDEV)(\"select\", {\n                value: theme,\n                onChange: (e)=>setTheme(e.target.value),\n                className: \"pr-8 \"/home/saschi/InfoTerminal/apps/frontend/src/lib/theme-provider.tsx\",\n            lineNumber: 200,\n            columnNumber: 7\n        }, this);\n    }\n    return /*#__PURE__*/ (0,react_jsx_dev_runtime__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_0__.jsxDEV)(\"button\", {\n        onClick: toggleTheme,\n        className: `\n        ${sizeClasses[size]} rounded-lg border transition-all duration-200 hover:scale-105 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary-500 focus:ring-offset-2\n        ${isDark ? \"bg-gray-800 border-gray-600 text-gray-200 hover:bg-gray-700\" : \"bg-white border-gray-300 text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-50\"}\n        ${showLabel ? \"flex items-center gap-2 px-3\" : \"flex items-center justify-center\"}\n        ${className}\n      `,\n        title: `Switch to ${theme === \"light\" ? \"dark\" : theme === \"dark\" ? \"system\" : \"light\"} theme`,\n        \"aria-label\": `Current theme: ${getLabel()}. Click to switch theme.`,\n        children: [\n            getIcon(),\n            showLabel && /*#__PURE__*/ (0,react_jsx_dev_runtime__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_0__.jsxDEV)(\"span\", {\n                className: \"text-sm font-medium\",\n                children: getLabel()\n            }, void 0, false, {\n                fileName: \"/home/saschi/InfoTerminal/apps/frontend/src/lib/theme-provider.tsx\",\n                lineNumber: 230,\n                columnNumber: 21\n            }, this)\n        ]\n    }, void 0, true, {\n        fileName: \"/home/saschi/InfoTerminal/apps/frontend/src/lib/theme-provider.tsx\",\n        lineNumber: 215,\n        columnNumber: 5\n    }, this);\n}\n// Dark Mode Styles Hook\nfunction useDarkModeStyles() {\n    const { isDark } = useTheme();\n    return {\n        // Background classes\n        bg: {\n            primary: isDark ? \"bg-gray-900\" : \"bg-white\",\n            secondary: isDark ? \"bg-gray-800\" : \"bg-gray-50\",\n            tertiary: isDark ? \"bg-gray-700\" : \"bg-gray-100\"\n        },\n        // Text classes\n        text: {\n            primary: isDark ? \"text-gray-100\" : \"text-gray-900\",\n            secondary: isDark ? \"text-gray-300\" : \"text-gray-600\",\n            tertiary: isDark ? \"text-gray-400\" : \"text-gray-500\"\n        },\n        // Border classes\n        border: {\n            default: isDark ? \"border-gray-600\" : \"border-gray-300\",\n            light: isDark ? \"border-gray-700\" : \"border-gray-200\"\n        },\n        // Interactive classes\n        hover: {\n            bg: isDark ? \"hover:bg-gray-700\" : \"hover:bg-gray-50\",\n            text: isDark ? \"hover:text-gray-200\" : \"hover:text-gray-700\"\n        }\n    };\n}\n//# sourceURL=[module]\n//# sourceMappingURL=data:application/json;charset=utf-8;base64,\n//# sourceURL=webpack-internal:///./src/lib/theme-provider.tsx\n");

apps/frontend/src/lib/theme-provider.tsx - Enhanced Theme Provider with Dark Mode\n\n\nconst ThemeContext = /*#__PURE__*/ (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__.createContext)(undefined);\nconst THEME_KEY = \"ui.theme\";\nfunction ThemeProvider({ children }) {\n    const [theme, setTheme] = (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__.useState)(\"system\");\n    const [resolvedTheme, setResolvedTheme] = (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__.useState)(\"light\");\n    const [mounted, setMounted] = (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__.useState)(false);\n    (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__.useEffect)(()=>{\n        setMounted(true);\n        // Load theme from localStorage\n        let savedTheme = null;\n        try {\n            savedTheme = localStorage.getItem(THEME_KEY);\n        } catch  {}\n        if (savedTheme && [\n            \"light\",\n            \"dark\",\n            \"system\"\n        ].includes(savedTheme)) {\n            setTheme(savedTheme);\n        }\n    }, []);\n    (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__.useEffect)(()=>{\n        if (!mounted) return;\n        const root = window.document.documentElement;\n        const updateTheme = ()=>{\n            let newResolvedTheme;\n            if (theme === \"system\") {\n                newResolvedTheme = window.matchMedia(\"(prefers-color-scheme: dark)\").matches ? \"dark\" : \"light\";\n            } else {\n                newResolvedTheme = theme;\n            }\n            setResolvedTheme(newResolvedTheme);\n            // Update DOM: only toggle .dark on <html>\n            if (newResolvedTheme === \"dark\") {\n                if (!root.classList.contains(\"dark\")) root.classList.add(\"dark\");\n            } else {\n                if (root.classList.contains(\"dark\")) root.classList.remove(\"dark\");\n            }\n            // Single authority attributes\n            root.setAttribute(\"data-theme\", newResolvedTheme);\n            root.setAttribute(\"data-theme-owner\", \"tp\");\n            // Never allow body.dark\n            if (document.body) document.body.classList.remove(\"dark\");\n            // Update meta theme-color for mobile browsers\n            const metaThemeColor = document.querySelector('meta[name=\"theme-color\"]');\n            if (metaThemeColor) {\n                metaThemeColor.setAttribute(\"content\", newResolvedTheme === \"dark\" ? \"#1f2937\" : \"#ffffff\");\n            }\n            // Update CSS custom properties\n            if (newResolvedTheme === \"dark\") {\n                root.style.setProperty(\"--color-bg-primary\", \"#1f2937\");\n                root.style.setProperty(\"--color-bg-secondary\", \"#111827\");\n                root.style.setProperty(\"--color-text-primary\", \"#f9fafb\");\n                root.style.setProperty(\"--color-text-secondary\", \"#d1d5db\");\n                root.style.setProperty(\"--color-border\", \"#374151\");\n            } else {\n                root.style.setProperty(\"--color-bg-primary\", \"#ffffff\");\n                root.style.setProperty(\"--color-bg-secondary\", \"#f8fafc\");\n                root.style.setProperty(\"--color-text-primary\", \"#1f2937\");\n                root.style.setProperty(\"--color-text-secondary\", \"#6b7280\");\n                root.style.setProperty(\"--color-border\", \"#e5e7eb\");\n            }\n        };\n        updateTheme();\n        // Listen only when user mode is system\n        if (theme === \"system\") {\n            const mediaQuery = window.matchMedia(\"(prefers-color-scheme: dark)\");\n            const handleChange = ()=>updateTheme();\n            mediaQuery.addEventListener(\"change\", handleChange);\n            return ()=>mediaQuery.removeEventListener(\"change\", handleChange);\n        }\n    }, [\n        theme,\n        mounted\n    ]);\n    const handleSetTheme = (newTheme)=>{\n        setTheme(newTheme);\n        try {\n            localStorage.setItem(THEME_KEY, newTheme);\n        } catch  {}\n    };\n    const value = {\n        theme,\n        setTheme: handleSetTheme,\n        resolvedTheme,\n        isDark: resolvedTheme === \"dark\"\n    };\n    return /*#__PURE__*/ (0,react_jsx_dev_runtime__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_0__.jsxDEV)(ThemeContext.Provider, {\n        value: value,\n        children: children\n    }, void 0, false, {\n        fileName: \"/home/saschi/InfoTerminal/apps/frontend/src/lib/theme-provider.tsx\",\n        lineNumber: 109,\n        columnNumber: 5\n    }, this);\n}\nfunction useTheme() {\n    const context = (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__.useContext)(ThemeContext);\n    if (context === undefined) {\n        // Fallback for tests or environments without the provider\n        const isDark = typeof document !== \"undefined\" && document.documentElement.classList.contains(\"dark\");\n        return {\n            theme: \"system\",\n            setTheme: ()=>{},\n            resolvedTheme: isDark 'dark':'light');\n    de.setAttribute('data-theme-owner','tp');\n    document.body && document.body.classList.remove('dark');\n    if (typeof window!=='undefined') {\n      window.__theme = {\n        get: function(){ try { return localStorage.getItem(KEY)||'light'; } catch(_) { return 'light'; }},\n        set: function(mode){ try{ localStorage.setItem(KEY, mode); }catch(e){}; \n          var s = window.matchMedia && window.matchMedia('(prefers-color-scheme: dark)').matches;\n          var d = mode==='dark' || (mode==='system' && s);\n          de.classList.toggle('dark', !!d);\n          de.setAttribute('data-theme', d ? 'dark':'light');\n          de.setAttribute('data-theme-owner','tp');\n          document.body && document.body.classList.remove('dark');\n        }\n      };\n    }\n  }catch(e){}\n})();`;\nclass THEME_KEY = \"ui.theme\";\nfunction ThemeProvider({ children }) {\n    const [theme, setTheme] = (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__.useState)(\"system\");\n    const [resolvedTheme, setResolvedTheme] = (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__.useState)(\"light\");\n    const [mounted, setMounted] = (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__.useState)(false);\n    (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__.useEffect)(()=>{\n        setMounted(true);\n        // Load theme from localStorage\n        let savedTheme = null;\n        try {\n            savedTheme = \"dark\" : \"light\";\n            } else {\n                newResolvedTheme = theme;\n            }\n            setResolvedTheme(newResolvedTheme);\n            // Update DOM: only toggle .dark on <html>\n            if (newResolvedTheme === \"dark\") {\n                if (!root.classList.contains(\"dark\")) root.classList.add(\"dark\");\n            } else {\n                if (root.classList.contains(\"dark\")) root.classList.remove(\"dark\");\n            }\n            // Single authority attributes\n            root.setAttribute(\"data-theme\", newResolvedTheme);\n            root.setAttribute(\"data-theme-owner\", \"tp\");\n            // Never allow body.dark\n            if (document.body) document.body.classList.remove(\"dark\");\n            // Update meta theme-color for mobile browsers\n            const metaThemeColor = document.querySelector('meta[name=\"theme-color\"]');\n            if (metaThemeColor) {\n                metaThemeColor.setAttribute(\"content\", newResolvedTheme === \"dark\" ? \"#1f2937\" : \"#ffffff\");\n            }\n            // Update CSS custom properties\n            if (newResolvedTheme === \"dark\") {\n                root.style.setProperty(\"--color-bg-primary\", \"#1f2937\");\n                root.style.setProperty(\"--color-bg-secondary\", \"#111827\");\n                root.style.setProperty(\"--color-text-primary\", \"#f9fafb\");\n                root.style.setProperty(\"--color-text-secondary\", \"#d1d5db\");\n                root.style.setProperty(\"--color-border\", \"#374151\");\n            } else {\n                root.style.setProperty(\"--color-bg-primary\", \"#ffffff\");\n                root.style.setProperty(\"--color-bg-secondary\", \"#f8fafc\");\n                root.style.setProperty(\"--color-text-primary\", \"#1f2937\");\n                root.style.setProperty(\"--color-text-secondary\", \"#6b7280\");\n                root.style.setProperty(\"--color-border\", \"#e5e7eb\");\n            }\n        };\n        updateTheme();\n        // Listen only when user mode is system\n        if (theme === \"system\") {\n            const mediaQuery = window.matchMedia(\"(prefers-color-scheme: dark)\");\n            const handleChange = ()=>updateTheme();\n            mediaQuery.addEventListener(\"change\", handleChange);\n            return ()=>mediaQuery.removeEventListener(\"change\", handleChange);\n        }\n    }, [\n        theme,\n        mounted\n    ]);\n    const handleSetTheme = (newTheme)=>{\n        setTheme(newTheme);\n        try {\n            localStorage.setItem(THEME_KEY, newTheme);\n        } catch  {}\n    };\n    const value = {\n        theme,\n        setTheme: handleSetTheme,\n        resolvedTheme,\n        isDark: resolvedTheme === \"dark\"\n    };\n    return /*#__PURE__*/ (0,react_jsx_dev_runtime__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_0__.jsxDEV)(ThemeContext.Provider, {\n        value: value,\n        children: children\n    }, void 0, false, {\n        fileName: \"/home/saschi/InfoTerminal/apps/frontend/src/lib/theme-provider.tsx\",\n        lineNumber: 109,\n        columnNumber: 5\n    }, this);\n}\nfunction useTheme() {\n    const context = (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__.useContext)(ThemeContext);\n    if (context === undefined) {\n        // Fallback for tests or environments without the provider\n        const isDark = typeof [theme, setTheme] = (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__.useState)(\"system\");\n    const [resolvedTheme, setResolvedTheme] = (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__.useState)(\"light\");\n    const [mounted, setMounted] = (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__.useState)(false);\n    (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__.useEffect)(()=>{\n        setMounted(true);\n        // Load theme from localStorage\n        let savedTheme = null;\n        try {\n            savedTheme = localStorage.getItem(THEME_KEY);\n        } catch (e) {}\n        if (savedTheme && [\n            \"light\",\n            \"dark\",\n            \"system\"\n        ].includes(savedTheme)) {\n            setTheme(savedTheme);\n        }\n    }, []);\n    (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__.useEffect)(()=>{\n        if (!mounted) return;\n        const root = window.document.documentElement;\n        const updateTheme = ()=>{\n            let newResolvedTheme;\n            if (theme === \"system\") {\n                newResolvedTheme = window.matchMedia(\"(prefers-color-scheme: dark)\").matches ? \"dark\" : \"light\";\n            } else {\n                newResolvedTheme = theme;\n            }\n            setResolvedTheme(newResolvedTheme);\n            // Update DOM: only toggle .dark on <html>\n            if (newResolvedTheme === \"dark\") {\n                if (!root.classList.contains(\"dark\")) root.classList.add(\"dark\");\n            } else {\n                if (root.classList.contains(\"dark\")) root.classList.remove(\"dark\");\n            }\n            // Single authority attributes\n            root.setAttribute(\"data-theme\", newResolvedTheme);\n            root.setAttribute(\"data-theme-owner\", \"tp\");\n            // Never allow body.dark\n            if (document.body) document.body.classList.remove(\"dark\");\n            // Update meta theme-color for mobile browsers\n            const metaThemeColor = \"#ffffff\");\n            }\n            // Update CSS custom properties\n            if (newResolvedTheme === \"dark\") {\n                root.style.setProperty(\"--color-bg-primary\", \"bg-gray-900\" : \"bg-white\",\n            secondary: isDark ? \"bg-gray-800\" : \"bg-gray-50\",\n            tertiary: isDark ? \"bg-gray-700\" : \"bg-gray-100\"\n        },\n        // Text classes\n        text: {\n            primary: isDark ? \"text-gray-100\" : \"text-gray-900\",\n            secondary: isDark ? \"text-gray-300\" : \"text-gray-600\",\n            tertiary: isDark ? \"text-gray-400\" : \"text-gray-500\"\n        },\n        // Border classes\n        border: {\n            default: isDark ? \"border-gray-600\" : \"border-gray-300\",\n            light: isDark ? \"border-gray-700\" : \"border-gray-200\"\n        },\n        // Interactive classes\n        hover: {\n            bg: isDark ? \"hover:bg-gray-700\" : \"hover:bg-gray-50\",\n            text: isDark ? \"hover:text-gray-200\" : \"hover:text-gray-700\"\n        }\n    };\n}\n_s3(useDarkModeStyles, \"p8LwrWNaEMX2B6gWWkmgIiuCFNw=\", false, function() {\n    return [\n        useTheme\n    ];\n});\nvar _c, _c1;\n$RefreshReg$(_c, \"ThemeProvider\");\n$RefreshReg$(_c1, \"ThemeToggle\");\n\n\n;\n    // Wrapped in an IIFE to avoid polluting the global scope\n    ;\n    (function () {\n        var _a, _b;\n        // Legacy CSS implementations will `eval` browser code in a Node.js context\n        // to extract CSS. For backwards compatibility, we need to check we're in a\n        // browser context before continuing.\n        if (typeof self !== 'undefined' &&\n            // AMP / No-JS mode does not inject these helpers:\n            '$RefreshHelpers$' in self) {\n            // @ts-ignore __webpack_module__ is global\n            var currentExports = module.exports;\n            // @ts-ignore __webpack_module__ is global\n            var prevSignature = (_b = (_a = module.hot.data) === null || _a === void 0 ? void 0 : _a.prevSignature) !== null && _b !== void 0 ? _b : null;\n            // This cannot happen in MainTemplate because the exports mismatch between\n            // templating and execution.\n            self.$RefreshHelpers$.registerExportsForReactRefresh(currentExports, module.id);\n            // A module can be accepted automatically based on its exports, e.g. when\n            // it is a Refresh Boundary.\n            if (self.$RefreshHelpers$.isReactRefreshBoundary(currentExports)) {\n                // Save the previous exports signature on update so we can compare the boundary\n                // signatures. We avoid saving exports themselves since it causes memory leaks (https://github.com/vercel/next.js/pull/53797)\n                module.hot.dispose(function (data) {\n                    data.prevSignature =\n                        self.$RefreshHelpers$.getRefreshBoundarySignature(currentExports);\n                });\n                // Unconditionally accept an update to this module, we'll check if it's\n                // still a Refresh Boundary later.\n                // @ts-ignore importMeta is replaced in the loader\n                module.hot.accept();\n                // This field is set when the previous version of this module was a\n                // Refresh Boundary, letting us know we need to check for invalidation or\n                // enqueue an update.\n                if (prevSignature !== null) {\n                    // A boundary can become ineligible if its exports are incompatible\n                    // with the previous exports.\n                    //\n                    // For example, if you add/remove/change exports, we'll want to\n                    // re-execute the importing modules, and force those components to\n                    // re-render. Similarly, if you convert a class component to a\n                    // function, we want to invalidate the boundary.\n                    if (self.$RefreshHelpers$.shouldInvalidateReactRefreshBoundary(prevSignature, self.$RefreshHelpers$.getRefreshBoundarySignature(currentExports))) {\n                        module.hot.invalidate();\n                    }\n                    else {\n                        self.$RefreshHelpers$.scheduleUpdate();\n                    }\n                }\n            }\n            else {\n                // Since we just executed the code for the module, it's possible that the\n                // new exports made it ineligible for being a boundary.\n                // We only care about the case when we were _previously_ a boundary,\n                // because we already accepted this update (accidental side effect).\n                var isNoLongerABoundary = prevSignature !== null;\n                if (isNoLongerABoundary) {\n                    module.hot.invalidate();\n                }\n            }\n        }\n    })();\n//# sourceURL=[module]\n//# sourceMappingURL=data:application/json;charset=utf-8;base64,\n//# sourceURL=webpack-internal:///./src/lib/theme-provider.tsx\n"));

'dark':'light');\n    de.setAttribute('data-theme-owner','tp');\n    document.body && document.body.classList.remove('dark');\n    if (typeof window!=='undefined') {\n      window.__theme = {\n        get: function(){ try { return localStorage.getItem(KEY)||'light'; } catch(_) { return 'light'; }},\n        set: function(mode){ try{ localStorage.setItem(KEY, mode); }catch(e){}; \n          var s = window.matchMedia && window.matchMedia('(prefers-color-scheme: dark)').matches;\n          var d = mode==='dark' || (mode==='system' && s);\n          de.classList.toggle('dark', !!d);\n          de.setAttribute('data-theme', d ? apps/frontend/src/lib/theme-provider.tsx - Enhanced Theme Provider with Dark Mode\n\n\nconst ThemeContext = /*#__PURE__*/ (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__.createContext)(undefined);\nconst THEME_KEY = \"ui.theme\";\nfunction ThemeProvider({ children }) {\n    const [theme, setTheme] = (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__.useState)(\"system\");\n    const [resolvedTheme, setResolvedTheme] = (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__.useState)(\"light\");\n    const [mounted, setMounted] = (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__.useState)(false);\n    (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__.useEffect)(()=>{\n        setMounted(true);\n        // Load theme from localStorage\n        let savedTheme = null;\n        try {\n            savedTheme = localStorage.getItem(THEME_KEY);\n        } catch  {}\n        if (savedTheme && [\n            \"light\",\n            \"dark\",\n            \"system\"\n        ].includes(savedTheme)) {\n            setTheme(savedTheme);\n        }\n    }, []);\n    (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__.useEffect)(()=>{\n        if (!mounted) return;\n        const root = window.document.documentElement;\n        const updateTheme = ()=>{\n            let newResolvedTheme;\n            if (theme === \"system\") {\n                newResolvedTheme = window.matchMedia(\"(prefers-color-scheme: dark)\").matches ? \"dark\" : \"light\";\n            } else {\n                newResolvedTheme = theme;\n            }\n            setResolvedTheme(newResolvedTheme);\n            // Update DOM: only toggle .dark on <html>\n            if (newResolvedTheme === \"dark\") {\n                if (!root.classList.contains(\"dark\")) root.classList.add(\"dark\");\n            } else {\n                if (root.classList.contains(\"dark\")) root.classList.remove(\"dark\");\n            }\n            // Single authority attributes\n            root.setAttribute(\"data-theme\", newResolvedTheme);\n            root.setAttribute(\"data-theme-owner\", \"tp\");\n            // Never allow body.dark\n            if (document.body) document.body.classList.remove(\"dark\");\n            // Update meta theme-color for mobile browsers\n            const metaThemeColor = document.querySelector('meta[name=\"theme-color\"]');\n            if (metaThemeColor) {\n                metaThemeColor.setAttribute(\"content\", newResolvedTheme === \"dark\" ? \"#1f2937\" : \"#ffffff\");\n            }\n            // Update CSS custom properties\n            if (newResolvedTheme === \"dark\") {\n                root.style.setProperty(\"--color-bg-primary\", \"#1f2937\");\n                root.style.setProperty(\"--color-bg-secondary\", \"#111827\");\n root.style.setProperty(\"--color-border\", \"#374151\");\n            } else {\n                root.style.setProperty(\"--color-bg-primary\", \"#ffffff\");\n                root.style.setProperty(\"--color-bg-secondary\", \"#f8fafc\");\n                root.style.setProperty(\"--color-text-primary\", \"#1f2937\");\n                root.style.setProperty(\"--color-text-secondary\", \"#6b7280\");\n                root.style.setProperty(\"--color-border\", \"#e5e7eb\");\n            }\n        };\n        updateTheme();\n        // Listen only when user mode is system\n        if (theme === \"system\") {\n            const mediaQuery = window.matchMedia(\"(prefers-color-scheme: dark)\");\n            const handleChange = ()=>updateTheme();\n            mediaQuery.addEventListener(\"change\", handleChange);\n            return ()=>mediaQuery.removeEventListener(\"change\", handleChange);\n        }\n    }, [\n        theme,\n        mounted\n    ]);\n    const handleSetTheme = (newTheme)=>{\n        setTheme(newTheme);\n        try {\n            localStorage.setItem(THEME_KEY, newTheme);\n        } catch  {}\n    };\n    const value = {\n        theme,\n        setTheme: handleSetTheme,\n        resolvedTheme,\n        isDark: resolvedTheme === \"dark\"\n    };\n    return /*#__PURE__*/ (0,react_jsx_dev_runtime__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_0__.jsxDEV)(ThemeContext.Provider, {\n        value: value,\n        children: children\n    }, void 0, false, {\n        fileName: \"/home/saschi/InfoTerminal/apps/frontend/src/lib/theme-provider.tsx\",\n        lineNumber: 109,\n        columnNumber: 5\n    }, this);\n}\nfunction useTheme() {\n    const context = (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__.useContext)(ThemeContext);\n    if (context === undefined) {\n        // Fallback for tests or environments without the provider\n        const isDark = typeof document !== \"undefined\" && document.documentElement.classList.contains(\"dark\");\n        return {\n            theme: \"system\",\n            setTheme: ()=>{},\n            resolvedTheme: isDark ? \"dark\" : \"light\",\n            isDark\n        };\n    }\n    return context;\n}\n// Enhanced Theme Toggle Component\n\nfunction ThemeToggle({ size = \"md\", variant = \"button\", showLabel = false, className = \"\" }) {\n    const { theme, setTheme, resolvedTheme, isDark } = useTheme();\n    const [mounted, setMounted] = (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__.useState)(false);\n    (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__.useEffect)(()=>{\n        setMounted(true);\n    }, []);\n    if (!mounted) {\n        const sizeClasses = {\n            sm: \"w-8 h-8\",\n            md: \"w-9     lineNumber: 160,\n            columnNumber: 7\n        }, this);\n    }\n    const sizeClasses = {\n        sm: \"p-1.5\",\n        md: \"p-2\",\n        lg: \"p-2.5\"\n    };\n    const iconSizes = {\n        sm: 14,\n        md: 16,\n        lg: 18\n    };\n    const toggleTheme = ()=>{\n        if (theme === \"light\") {\n            setTheme(\"dark\");\n        } else if (theme === \"dark\") {\n            setTheme(\"system\");\n        } else {\n            setTheme(\"light\");\n        }\n    };\n    const getIcon = ()=>{\n        if (theme === \"system\") return /*#__PURE__*/ (0,react_jsx_dev_runtime__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_0__.jsxDEV)(\"button\", {\n        onClick: toggleTheme,\n        className: `\n        ${sizeClasses[size]} rounded-lg border transition-all duration-200 hover:scale-105 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary-500 focus:ring-offset-2\n        ${isDark ? \"bg-gray-800 border-gray-600 text-gray-200 hover:bg-gray-700\" : \"bg-white border-gray-300 text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-50\"}\n        ${showLabel ? \"flex items-center gap-2 px-3\" : \"flex items-center justify-center\"}\n        ${className}\n      `,\n        title: `Switch to ${theme === \"light\" ? \"dark\" : theme === \"dark\" ? \"system\" : \"light\"} theme`,\n        \"aria-label\": `Current theme: ${getLabel()}. Click to switch theme.`,\n        children: [\n            getIcon(),\n            showLabel && /*#__PURE__*/ (0,react_jsx_dev_runtime__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_0__.jsxDEV)(\"span\", {\n                className: \"text-sm font-medium\",\n                children: getLabel()\n            }, void 0, false, {\n                fileName: \"/home/saschi/InfoTerminal/apps/frontend/src/lib/theme-provider.tsx\",\n                lineNumber: 230,\n                columnNumber: 21\n            }, this)\n        ]\n    }, void 0, true, {\n        fileName: \"/home/saschi/InfoTerminal/apps/frontend/src/lib/theme-provider.tsx\",\n        lineNumber: 215,\n        columnNumber: 5\n    }, this);\n}\n// Dark Mode Styles Hook\nfunction useDarkModeStyles() {\n    const { isDark } = useTheme();\n    return {\n        // Background classes\n        bg: {\n            primary: isDark ? \"bg-gray-900\" : \"bg-white\",\n            secondary: isDark ? \"bg-gray-800\" : \"bg-gray-50\",\n            tertiary: isDark ? \"bg-gray-700\" : \"bg-gray-100\"\n        },\n        // Text classes\n        text: {\n            primary: isDark ? \"text-gray-100\" : \"text-gray-900\",\n            secondary: isDark ? \"text-gray-300\" : \"text-gray-600\",\n            tertiary: isDark ? \"text-gray-400\" : \"text-gray-500\"\n        },\n        // Border classes\n        border: {\n            default: isDark ? \"border-gray-600\" : \"border-gray-300\",\n            light: isDark ? \"border-gray-700\" : \"border-gray-200\"\n        },\n        // Interactive classes\n        hover: {\n            bg: isDark ? \"hover:bg-gray-700\" : \"hover:bg-gray-50\",\n            text: isDark ? \"hover:text-gray-200\" : \"hover:text-gray-700\"\n        }\n    };\n}\n//# sourceURL=[module]\n//# sourceMappingURL=data:application/json;charset=utf-8;base64,\n//# sourceURL=webpack-internal:///./src/lib/theme-provider.tsx\n");
apps/frontend/.next/server/pages/_document.js:22:eval("__webpack_require__.r(__webpack_exports__);\n/* harmony export */ __webpack_require__.d(__webpack_exports__, {\n/* harmony export */   \"default\": () => (/* binding */ MyDocument)\n/* harmony export */ });\n/* harmony import */ var react_jsx_dev_runtime__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_0__ = __webpack_require__(/*! react/jsx-dev-runtime */ \"react/jsx-dev-runtime\");\n/* harmony import */ var react_jsx_dev_runtime__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_0___default = /*#__PURE__*/__webpack_require__.n(react_jsx_dev_runtime__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_0__);\n/* harmony import */ var next_document__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__ = __webpack_require__(/*! next/document */ \"../../node_modules/.pnpm/next@14.2.5_@opentelemetry+api@1.9.0_@playwright+test@1.55.0_react-dom@18.3.1_react@18.3.1__react@18.3.1/node_modules/next/document.js\");\n/* harmony import */ var next_document__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1___default = /*#__PURE__*/__webpack_require__.n(next_document__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__);\n\n\nconst themeInit = `\n(function(){\n  try{\n    var KEY='ui.theme';\n    var m = null;\n    try { m = localStorage.getItem(KEY); } catch(_) {}\n    var sys = window.matchMedia && window.matchMedia('(prefers-color-scheme: dark)').matches;\n    var dark = m==='dark' || (m==='system' && sys);\n    var de = document.documentElement;\n    de.classList.toggle('dark', !!dark);\n    de.setAttribute('data-theme', dark ? 'dark':'light');\n    de.setAttribute('data-theme-owner','tp');\n    document.body && document.body.classList.remove('dark');\n    if (typeof window!=='undefined') {\n      window.__theme = {\n        get: function(){ try { return localStorage.getItem(KEY)||'light'; } catch(_) { return 'light'; }},\n        set: function(mode){ try{ localStorage.setItem(KEY, mode); }catch(e){}; \n          var s = window.matchMedia && window.matchMedia('(prefers-color-scheme: dark)').matches;\n          var d = mode==='dark' || (mode==='system' && s);\n          de.classList.toggle('dark', !!d);\n          de.setAttribute('data-theme', d ? 'dark':'light');\n          de.setAttribute('data-theme-owner','tp');\n          document.body && document.body.classList.remove('dark');\n        }\n      };\n    }\n  }catch(e){}\n})();`;\nclass THEME_KEY = \"ui.theme\";\nfunction ThemeProvider({ children }) {\n    const [theme, setTheme] = (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__.useState)(\"system\");\n    const [resolvedTheme, setResolvedTheme] = (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__.useState)(\"light\");\n    const [mounted, setMounted] = (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__.useState)(false);\n    (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__.useEffect)(()=>{\n        setMounted(true);\n        // Load theme from localStorage\n        let savedTheme = null;\n        try {\n            savedTheme = localStorage.getItem(THEME_KEY);\n        } catch  {}\n        if (savedTheme && [\n            \"light\",\n            \"dark\",\n            \"system\"\n        ].includes(savedTheme)) {\n            setTheme(savedTheme);\n        }\n    }, []);\n    (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__.useEffect)(()=>{\n        if (!mounted) return;\n        const root = window.document.documentElement;\n        const updateTheme = ()=>{\n            let newResolvedTheme;\n            if (theme === \"system\") {\n                newResolvedTheme = window.matchMedia(\"(prefers-color-scheme: dark)\").matches ? \"dark\" : \"light\";\n            } else {\n                newResolvedTheme = theme;\n            }\n            setResolvedTheme(newResolvedTheme);\n            // Update DOM: only toggle .dark on <html>\n            if (newResolvedTheme === \"dark\") {\n                if (!root.classList.contains(\"dark\")) root.classList.add(\"dark\");\n            } else {\n                if (root.classList.contains(\"dark\")) root.classList.remove(\"dark\");\n            }\n            // Single authority attributes\n            root.setAttribute(\"data-theme\", newResolvedTheme);\n            root.setAttribute(\"data-theme-owner\", \"tp\");\n            // Never allow body.dark\n            if (document.body) document.body.classList.remove(\"dark\");\n            // Update meta theme-color for mobile browsers\n            const metaThemeColor = document.querySelector('meta[name=\"theme-color\"]');\n            if (metaThemeColor) {\n                metaThemeColor.setAttribute(\"content\", newResolvedTheme === \"dark\" ? \"#1f2937\" : \"#ffffff\");\n            }\n            // Update CSS custom properties\n            if (newResolvedTheme === \"dark\") {\n                root.style.setProperty(\"--color-bg-primary\", \"#1f2937\");\n                root.style.setProperty(\"--color-bg-secondary\", \"#111827\");\n                root.style.setProperty(\"--color-text-primary\", \"#f9fafb\");\n                root.style.setProperty(\"--color-text-secondary\", \"#d1d5db\");\n                root.style.setProperty(\"--color-border\", \"#374151\");\n            } else {\n                root.style.setProperty(\"--color-bg-primary\", \"#ffffff\");\n                root.style.setProperty(\"--color-bg-secondary\", \"#f8fafc\");\n                root.style.setProperty(\"--color-text-primary\", \"#1f2937\");\n                root.style.setProperty(\"--color-text-secondary\", \"#6b7280\");\n                root.style.setProperty(\"--color-border\", \"#e5e7eb\");\n            }\n        };\n        updateTheme();\n        // Listen only when user mode is system\n        if (theme === \"system\") {\n            const mediaQuery = window.matchMedia(\"(prefers-color-scheme: dark)\");\n            const handleChange = ()=>updateTheme();\n            mediaQuery.addEventListener(\"change\", handleChange);\n            return ()=>mediaQuery.removeEventListener(\"change\", handleChange);\n        }\n    }, [\n        theme,\n        mounted\n    ]);\n    const handleSetTheme = (newTheme)=>{\n        setTheme(newTheme);\n        try {\n            localStorage.setItem(THEME_KEY, newTheme);\n        } catch  {}\n    };\n    const value = {\n        theme,\n        setTheme: handleSetTheme,\n        resolvedTheme,\n        isDark: resolvedTheme === \"dark\"\n    };\n    return /*#__PURE__*/ (0,react_jsx_dev_runtime__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_0__.jsxDEV)(ThemeContext.Provider, {\n        value: value,\n        children: children\n    }, void 0, false, {\n        fileName: \"/home/saschi/InfoTerminal/apps/frontend/src/lib/theme-provider.tsx\",\n        lineNumber: 109,\n        columnNumber: 5\n    }, this);\n}\nfunction useTheme() {\n    const context = (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__.useContext)(ThemeContext);\n    if (context === undefined) {\n        // Fallback for tests or environments without the provider\n        const isDark = typeof document !== \"undefined\" && document.documentElement.classList.contains(\"dark\");\n        return {\n            theme: \"system\",\n            setTheme: ()=>{},\n            resolvedTheme: isDark ? \"dark\" : \"light\",\n            isDark\n        };\n    }\n    return context;\n}\n// Enhanced Theme Toggle Component\n\nfunction ThemeToggle({ size = \"md\", variant = \"button\", showLabel = false, className = \"\" }) {\n    const { theme, setTheme, resolvedTheme, isDark } = useTheme();\n    const [mounted, setMounted] = (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__.useState)(false);\n    (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__.useEffect)(()=>{\n        setMounted(true);\n    }, []);\n    if (!mounted) {\n        const sizeClasses = {\n            sm: \"w-8 h-8\",\n            md: \"w-9     lineNumber: 160,\n            columnNumber: 7\n        }, this);\n    }\n    const sizeClasses = {\n        sm: \"p-1.5\",\n        md: \"p-2\",\n        lg: \"p-2.5\"\n    };\n    const iconSizes = {\n        sm: 14,\n        md: 16,\n        lg: 18\n    };\n    const toggleTheme = ()=>{\n        if (theme === \"light\") {\n            setTheme(\"dark\");\n        } else if (theme === \"dark\") {\n            setTheme(\"system\");\n        } else {\n            setTheme(\"light\");\n        }\n    };\n    const getIcon = ()=>{\n        if (theme === \"system\") return /*#__PURE__*/ apps/frontend/src/lib/theme-provider.tsx - Enhanced Theme Provider with Dark Mode\n\n\nconst ThemeContext = /*#__PURE__*/ (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__.createContext)(undefined);\nconst THEME_KEY = \"ui.theme\";\nfunction ThemeProvider({ children }) {\n    const [theme, setTheme] = (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__.useState)(\"system\");\n    const [resolvedTheme, setResolvedTheme] = (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__.useState)(\"light\");\n    const [mounted, setMounted] = (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__.useState)(false);\n    (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__.useEffect)(()=>{\n        setMounted(true);\n        // Load theme from localStorage\n        let savedTheme = null;\n        try {\n            savedTheme = localStorage.getItem(THEME_KEY);\n        } catch  {}\n        if (savedTheme && [\n            \"light\",\n            \"dark\",\n            \"system\"\n        ].includes(savedTheme)) {\n            setTheme(savedTheme);\n        }\n    }, []);\n    (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__.useEffect)(()=>{\n        if (!mounted) return;\n        const root = window.document.documentElement;\n        const updateTheme = ()=>{\n            let newResolvedTheme;\n            if (theme === \"system\") {\n                newResolvedTheme = window.matchMedia(\"(prefers-color-scheme: dark)\").matches ? \"dark\" : \"light\";\n            } else {\n                newResolvedTheme = theme;\n            }\n            setResolvedTheme(newResolvedTheme);\n            // Update DOM: only toggle .dark on <html>\n            if (newResolvedTheme === \"dark\") {\n                if (!root.classList.contains(\"dark\")) root.classList.add(\"dark\");\n            } else {\n                if (root.classList.contains(\"dark\")) root.classList.remove(\"dark\");\n            }\n            // Single authority attributes\n            root.setAttribute(\"data-theme\", newResolvedTheme);\n            root.setAttribute(\"data-theme-owner\", \"tp\");\n            // Never allow body.dark\n            if (document.body) document.body.classList.remove(\"dark\");\n            // Update meta theme-color for mobile browsers\n            const metaThemeColor = document.querySelector('meta[name=\"theme-color\"]');\n            if (metaThemeColor) {\n                metaThemeColor.setAttribute(\"content\", newResolvedTheme === \"dark\" ? \"#1f2937\" : \"#ffffff\");\n            }\n            // Update CSS custom properties\n            if (newResolvedTheme === \"dark\") {\n                root.style.setProperty(\"--color-bg-primary\", \"#1f2937\");\n                root.style.setProperty(\"--color-bg-secondary\", \"#111827\");\n                root.style.setProperty(\"--color-text-primary\", \"#f9fafb\");\n                root.style.setProperty(\"--color-text-secondary\", \"#d1d5db\");\n                root.style.setProperty(\"--color-border\", \"#374151\");\n            } else {\n                root.style.setProperty(\"--color-bg-primary\", \"#ffffff\");\n                root.style.setProperty(\"--color-bg-secondary\", \"#f8fafc\");\n                root.style.setProperty(\"--color-text-primary\", \"#1f2937\");\n                root.style.setProperty(\"--color-text-secondary\", \"#6b7280\");\n                root.style.setProperty(\"--color-border\", \"#e5e7eb\");\n            }\n        };\n        updateTheme();\n        // Listen only when user mode is system\n        if (theme === \"system\") {\n            const mediaQuery = window.matchMedia(\"(prefers-color-scheme: dark)\");\n            const handleChange = ()=>updateTheme();\n            mediaQuery.addEventListener(\"change\", handleChange);\n            return ()=>mediaQuery.removeEventListener(\"change\", handleChange);\n        }\n    }, [\n };\n    const value = {\n        theme,\n        setTheme: handleSetTheme,\n        resolvedTheme,\n        isDark: resolvedTheme === \"dark\"\n    };\n    return /*#__PURE__*/ (0,react_jsx_dev_runtime__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_0__.jsxDEV)(ThemeContext.Provider, {\n        value: value,\n        children: children\n    }, void 0, false, {\n        fileName: \"/home/saschi/InfoTerminal/apps/frontend/src/lib/theme-provider.tsx\",\n        lineNumber: 109,\n        columnNumber: 5\n    }, this);\n}\nfunction useTheme() {\n    const context = (0,react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__.useContext)(ThemeContext);\n    if (context === undefined) {\n        // Fallback for tests or environments without the provider\n        const isDark = typeof \"bg-gray-900\" : \"bg-white\",\n            secondary: isDark ? \"bg-gray-800\" : \"bg-gray-50\",\n            tertiary: isDark ? \"bg-gray-700\" : \"bg-gray-100\"\n        },\n        // Text classes\n        text: {\n            primary: isDark ? \"text-gray-100\" : \"text-gray-900\",\n            secondary: isDark ? \"text-gray-300\" : \"text-gray-600\",\n            tertiary: isDark ? \"text-gray-400\" : \"text-gray-500\"\n        },\n        // Border classes\n        border: {\n            default: isDark ? \"border-gray-600\" : \"border-gray-300\",\n            light: isDark ? \"border-gray-700\" : \"border-gray-200\"\n        },\n        // Interactive classes\n        hover: {\n            bg: isDark ? \"hover:bg-gray-700\" : \"hover:bg-gray-50\",\n            text: isDark ? \"hover:text-gray-200\" : \"hover:text-gray-700\"\n        }\n    };\n}\n_s3(useDarkModeStyles, \"p8LwrWNaEMX2B6gWWkmgIiuCFNw=\", false, function() {\n    return [\n        useTheme\n    ];\n});\nvar _c, _c1;\n$RefreshReg$(_c, \"ThemeProvider\");\n$RefreshReg$(_c1, \"ThemeToggle\");\n\n\n;\n    // Wrapped in an IIFE to avoid polluting the global scope\n    ;\n    (function () {\n        var _a, _b;\n        // Legacy CSS implementations will `eval` browser code in a Node.js context\n        // to extract CSS. For backwards compatibility, we need to check we're in a\n        // browser context before continuing.\n        if (typeof self !== 'undefined' &&\n            // AMP / No-JS mode does not inject these helpers:\n            '$RefreshHelpers$' in self) {\n            // @ts-ignore __webpack_module__ is global\n            var currentExports = module.exports;\n            // @ts-ignore __webpack_module__ is global\n            var prevSignature = (_b = (_a = module.hot.data) === null || _a === void 0 ? void 0 : _a.prevSignature) !== null && _b !== void 0 ? _b : null;\n            // This cannot happen in MainTemplate because the exports mismatch between\n            // templating and execution.\n            self.$RefreshHelpers$.registerExportsForReactRefresh(currentExports, module.id);\n            // A module can be accepted automatically based on its exports, e.g. when\n            // it is a Refresh Boundary.\n            if (self.$RefreshHelpers$.isReactRefreshBoundary(currentExports)) {\n                // Save the previous exports signature on update so we can compare the boundary\n                // signatures. We avoid saving exports themselves since it causes memory leaks (https://github.com/vercel/next.js/pull/53797)\n                module.hot.dispose(function (data) {\n                    data.prevSignature =\n                        self.$RefreshHelpers$.getRefreshBoundarySignature(currentExports);\n                });\n                // Unconditionally accept an update to this module, we'll check if it's\n                // still a Refresh Boundary later.\n                // @ts-ignore importMeta is replaced in the loader\n                module.hot.accept();\n                // This field is set when the previous version of this module was a\n                // Refresh Boundary, letting us know we need to check for invalidation or\n                // enqueue an update.\n                if (prevSignature !== null) {\n                    // A boundary can become ineligible if its exports are incompatible\n                    // with the previous exports.\n                    //\n                    // For example, if you add/remove/change exports, we'll want to\n                    // re-execute the importing modules, and force those components to\n                    // re-render. Similarly, if you convert a class component to a\n                    // function, we want to invalidate the boundary.\n                    if (self.$RefreshHelpers$.shouldInvalidateReactRefreshBoundary(prevSignature, self.$RefreshHelpers$.getRefreshBoundarySignature(currentExports))) {\n                        module.hot.invalidate();\n                    }\n                    else {\n                        self.$RefreshHelpers$.scheduleUpdate();\n                    }\n                }\n            }\n            else {\n                // Since we just executed the code for the module, it's possible that the\n                // new exports made it ineligible for being a boundary.\n                // We only care about the case when we were _previously_ a boundary,\n                // because we already accepted this update (accidental side effect).\n                var isNoLongerABoundary = prevSignature !== null;\n                if (isNoLongerABoundary) {\n                    module.hot.invalidate();\n                }\n            }\n        }\n    })();\n//# sourceURL=[module]\n//# sourceMappingURL=data:application/json;charset=utf-8;base64,\n//# sourceURL=webpack-internal:///./src/lib/theme-provider.tsx\n"));
